item.camol.camo_item.hover: Right click a block to disguise it as this block. Right click a camoed block to undisguise it.
item.camol.camo_item.hover_type: Uses the collision shape of the camoed block.
item.camol.solid_camo_item.hover: Right click a block to disguise it as this block. Right click a camoed block to undisguise it.
item.camol.solid_camo_item.hover_type: Uses the collision shape of the camoing block.
